success_criteria: Explicitation artifact includes explicit_query, intent, domain_guess, entities, visual_evidence, assumptions, unknown_slots, retrieval_plan, answer_style, and confidence.
Retrieval gate blocks missing explicitation without governance waiver.
Tool endpoint explicate_query returns explicitation artifact JSON.
Golden fixtures cover screenshots, photos, diagrams, and maps.
stop_conditions: CI indicates prompt hash mismatch or metadata scope violation.
Explicitation output invents sensitive personal data.
